newsitem.title: UK: Liverpool cotton mart finds thin inquiry.
newsitem.headline: Liverpool cotton mart finds thin inquiry.

text.p: Despite persistent firmness of international shipment values for virtually all upland dscriptions of raw cotton, spinner enquiry was at a relatively low ebb in most European markets.
But a retail nearby business was noted particularly in Portugal and Italy in Central Asian and African styles.

Mills in Turkey remained in the market for US cotton for nearby shipment. In East Europe business was also uneventful. But mills in the Czech and Slovak republics made small purchases of central Asian medium qualities and Long Staple varieties for delivery nearby.
